mapper.select: SELECT NVL(A.PLUS19_YN ,'N') as PLUS19_YN ,CMPX_PROD_GRP_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD A ,TB_DP_CMPX_PROD B WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = #{productId} AND A.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000207'

SELECT /* VoucherMapper.selectVoucherMapProduct, 이용권 매핑상품 조회, SAC전시 이태균/I-S PLUS, 2015-05-11 */ * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , IV.* FROM ( SELECT COUNT(PD.PROD_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , FM.PROD_ID , FM.PART_PROD_ID , FM.CONTENTS_CLSF_CD , FM.EXPO_ORD ,(CASE WHEN FM.ICON_CLSF_CD='DP006701' THEN 'new' WHEN FM.ICON_CLSF_CD='DP006702' THEN 'closing' END) AS ICON_CLSF_CD , PD.TOP_MENU_ID , NVL(PD.PLUS19_YN, 'N') AS PLUS19_YN , (SELECT AGENCY_NM FROM TB_DP_VOD_PROD MP WHERE MP.PROD_ID = FM.PART_PROD_ID) AS AGENCY_NM , (SELECT CHNL_COMP_NM FROM TB_DP_VOD_PROD MP WHERE MP.PROD_ID = FM.PART_PROD_ID) AS CHNL_COMP_NM FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG FM , TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY CT WHERE FM.PROD_ID = #{productId} AND FM.PART_PROD_ID = PD.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PD.PROD_Id = MP.PROD_ID AND MP.MENU_ID = CT.MENU_ID AND MP.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND CT.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND PD.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
AND PD.PLUS19_YN = 'Y'
AND (PD.PLUS19_YN = 'N' OR PD.PLUS19_YN IS NULL)
AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RS, TB_DP_PROD EP, TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD ET WHERE RS.PROD_ID=PD.PROD_ID AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_CM_DEVICE DV WHERE DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND DV.USE_YN = 'Y' AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID in ('DP17' , 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN DV.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN = 'N' THEN (CASE WHEN EP.DRM_YN ='N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'Y' END AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID in ('DP17' , 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN DV.HDV_SPRT_YN = 'N' THEN (CASE WHEN SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD in ('PD009701' , 'PD009702') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'Y' END AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID in ('DP17' , 'DP18') THEN DV.VOD_FIXISTT_SPRT_YN WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP13' THEN DV.EBOOK_SPRT_YN WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP14' THEN DV.COMIC_SPRT_YN ELSE 'Y' END ) AND RS.PART_PROD_ID = EP.PROD_ID AND EP.PROD_ID = SC.PROD_ID AND EP.PROD_ID = ET.PROD_ID AND ET.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND ET.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' ) ORDER BY FM.EXPO_ORD, PD.LAST_DEPLOY_DT DESC ) IV ) OV WHERE OV.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND (#{offset}+#{count}-1) ORDER BY OV.RNUM
SELECT NVL(A.PLUS19_YN ,'N') as PLUS19_YN FROM TB_DP_PROD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROD_ID = #{productId}

SELECT /* VoucherMapper.searchVoucherSpecific, 특정 상품이 적용된 이용권 조회, SAC전시 김형식/지티소프트, 2015-05-11 */ * FROM ( SELECT IV.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT COUNT(PD.PROD_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , TP.TENANT_ID , DC.LANG_CD , PD.PROD_ID , PD.TOP_MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_DESC FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = PD.TOP_MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = DC.LANG_CD) AS TOP_MENU_NM , PD.META_CLSF_CD , PD.PROD_CHRG_YN , PD.SELLER_MBR_NO , PD.SVC_GRP_CD , PD.SVC_TYPE_CD , PD.PROD_GRD_CD , PD.CID , PD.MALL_CD , PD.FEE_CASE_CD , PD.FEE_UNIT_CD , UP.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , UP.USE_PERIOD , PD.DRM_YN , PD.DRM_SET_CD , PD.DRM_SET_VALUE , PD.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , TP.EXPO_ORD , TP.PROD_STATUS_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR , TB_DP_USE_POLICY UP ,(SELECT /*+ no_merge */ DISTINCT A.PROD_ID , NVL(C.PLUS19_YN,'N') AS PLUS19_YN FROM TB_DP_FIXRATE_PROD_MAPG A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B ,TB_DP_PROD C WHERE A.PART_PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD =#{prodRshpCd} AND (B.PROD_ID =#{productId} OR B.PART_PROD_ID=#{productId})
AND C.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
)PM WHERE PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.USE_POLICY_ID = UP.USE_POLICY_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = PM.PROD_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = PR.TENANT_ID AND PD.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000207' AND CM.SALE_POC_CD IN ('OR004501','OR004503') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_CM_DEVICE DV WHERE DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND DV.USE_YN = 'Y' AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17','DP18') THEN DV.VOD_FIXISTT_SPRT_YN WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP13' THEN DV.EBOOK_SPRT_YN WHEN PD.TOP_MENU_ID='DP14' THEN DV.COMIC_SPRT_YN ELSE 'Y' END ) AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD IN ('PD013202','PD013203') /* PD013202 : 판매중 , PD013203 : 판매중지*/ AND TP.EXPO_YN = 'Y'
AND CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD IN
#{kind}
AND PD.PLUS19_YN = 'Y'
AND (PD.PLUS19_YN = 'N' OR PD.PLUS19_YN IS NULL)
AND UP.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD IN ('DP010601','DP010603')
AND UP.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD IN ('DP010602','DP010603')
AND CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD IN ('DP004301','DP004305')
AND CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD IN ('DP004302','DP004305')
ORDER BY TP.EXPO_ORD, PD.REG_DT DESC ) IV ) OV WHERE OV.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND (#{offset}+#{count}-1) ORDER BY OV.RNUM

SELECT /* VoucherMapper.xml, searchVocherProductInfo, 에피소드 조회시 정보 조회, SAC전시 김형식/지티소프트, 2015-08-18 */ UP.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD ,EB.BOOK_CLSF_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD A , TB_DP_PROD_DESC B , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD C , TB_DP_EBOOK_PROD EB , TB_DP_USE_POLICY UP WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.PROD_ID = EB.PROD_ID (+) AND A.USE_POLICY_ID = UP.USE_POLICY_ID AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
